title: Conception II: Children of the Seven Stars
body:
Conception II: Children of the Seven Stars


Genres/Tags: RPG, Third-person, 3D, Japanese
Company: Spike Chunsoft
Languages: ENG/JAP
Original Size: 4.4 GB
Repack Size: from 1.17 GB [Selective Download]

Download Mirrors

  • ExtraTorrent [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Filehoster: MegaUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) with FIXED SELECTIVE BINS

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on non-scen Conception.II.Children.of.the.Seven.Stars-ALI213 release: 4,710,312,258 bytes
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation (only with both voicepacks installed)
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you can skip downloading and installing voicepack you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 4.4 to 1.2~1.7 GB, depending on selected voicepacks)
  • Installation takes 5-10 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 5 GB (~6 GB during installation)

Game Description

The magical world of Aterra has been under attack by monsters for decades.

The only ones who can stand against these monsters are “Disciples,” young men and women gifted with divine powers of purification, and otherworldly Star Children created via the bonds between male and female disciples.

As a new disciple, it falls to you to create Star Children with seven of the most powerful girls in the world and save Aterra.

Today Updates 1&2 was released, I’ve made a quick patch for them.

http://www87.zippyshare.com/v/ZO6rh3jB/file.html

Unzip to game folder, run patcher.bat, wait until patching/verification pass. Then you can delete 3 .OLD files (only those were actually changed).
